markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Gourd Home](/Equipment.aspx?ID=509)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 72</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This dried gourd seems entirely nondescript, as it is hollow and has a sturdy cord wrapped around its neck for easy carrying. Closer inspection reveals the gourd has grown in the rough shape of a hut or similar small dwelling.

<document level="2" id="action-313" />

<document level="2" id="action-314" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gourd Home
